Table of contents » Commands for setting up measurements/Observables

RMSD over Ramachandran angles

Available options

  • ref_angle_file ref_angle_file phipsi.list
    The file with the angles should contain 3 columns: residue index i, phi_i, psi_i. Note that the residue indices not found in the file are not considered for the calculation.
  • ref_angle_pdbfile ref_angle_pdbfile molecule.pdb
    This class can infer the comparison values for the Ramachandran angles from a given structure in the form of a PDB file. Selection rules described in ProFASi PDB handling: Selections and Filters apply.
See also:
prf::RCAngleRMSD
